name: A Train
description:
This is a part of my "Bored Games" series, I make random games/experiences to learn new code or just a stupid idea that comes to mind.

Story: When I was leaving work at around 10pm every day while waiting for my train the post trains would go past, they seemed to go past for way longer than you'd think and so I emulated that experience here.

Controls:

Alt+F4 to close the game.

H for Horn.
